questions.question: If f(x<sub>1</sub>) × f(x<sub>2</sub>) < 0, select most suitable option.

answers.b: x<sub>1</sub> & x<sub>2</sub>, contains at least one root

questions.question: If f(x<sub>1</sub>) × f(x<sub>2</sub>) > 0, select most suitable option.

answers.b: Root does not lie between x<sub>1</sub> & x<sub>2</sub>
answers.c: Root may lie or may not lie between x<sub>1</sub> & x<sub>2</sub>

answers.a: Equation do not have real root
answers.c: Either x<sub>1</sub> or x<sub>2</sub> is the root of the equation
answers.d: Equation cannot be solved by bisection method
